amendment.description: An amendment inserting, ", of which not less than $70,700,00 shall be for the Minority University Research and Education Programs," after the dollar amount.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Johnson, E. B. amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A024) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Ms. Johnson, E. B..
